meanings.definition: An event that happens by chance or without apparent cause.
meanings.sent1: The car crash was an accident.
meanings.sent2: She tripped and fell by accident.
meanings.sent3: It was an accident that the cake fell on the floor.
meanings.sent4: His success was no accident; he worked hard for it.
meanings.sent5: The meeting's cancellation was an unfortunate accident.

meanings.definition: An unfortunate incident that happens unexpectedly and unintentionally.
meanings.sent1: The fire at the factory was a terrible accident.
meanings.sent2: Losing her wallet was a complete accident.
meanings.sent3: It was an accident that the dog ate the homework.
meanings.sent4: The accident of spilling coffee on her dress ruined her day.
meanings.sent5: The car crash was a tragic accident that changed their lives forever.

meanings.sent1: Dropping the vase was a clumsy accident.
meanings.sent2: Forgetting her keys was a silly accident.
meanings.sent3: The burnt dinner was an unfortunate accident.
meanings.sent4: His wrong turn was a minor accident in their journey.
meanings.sent5: The miscommunication was an avoidable accident that led to confusion.
